column1: Topic title: Gerakan  Fireworks Mishap Proves Poor Governance

column8: Party says it is unacceptable that the Klang Municipal Council did not apply for a permit nor use a licensed fireworks operator, thus putting 15,000 people at risk.The Klang fireworks display mishap clearly proves poor governance by the Pakatan Harapan-led Selangor government, says state Gerakan Liaison Committee Chairman David Ang Chin Tat.He said it was totally unacceptable for a local authority like the Klang Municipal Council (MPK) to overlook applying for a permit for the fireworks display and hiring an unlicensed fireworks operator to usher in the New Year.“It is absolutely unacceptable that the MPK, whose duty is to issue and enforce various licenses and permits, did not apply for a permit nor use a licensed fireworks operator, thus putting 15,000 members of the public at risk,” he said in a statement.Early Sunday morning, a total of 14 people, four of whom were children, were injured when they were hit by fragments of fireworks when it exploded on the ground at the Pandamaran Sports Complex during the New Year celebration.MPK was the organiser of the Gegar Klang Fiesta from Dec 30 to Jan 1.David Ang said the Selangor government should be held responsible for this failure and charged with criminal negligence in performing its duties.He also called for the immediate resignation of Selangor executive councillor in charge of local government, Ean Yong Hian Wah, and those found to have been responsible for the mishap.http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/...ate-governance/

Now blaming PDRM pulak for not informing MPK that they need permits..   http://www.selangorpress.net/selangor/2017...i-tanpa-permit/Majlis Perbandaran Klang (MPK) mempersoalkan tindakan polis yang didakwa membiarkan acara pertunjukan bunga api sempena Sambutan Tahun Baharu 2017 Fiesta Gegar Klang diteruskan walaupun tidak mempunyai permit.Yang Di-Pertuanya, Datuk Mohamad Yasid Bidin berkata polis seharusnya memaklumkan lebih awal berhubung permohonan permit tersebut, selain melarang penganjur meneruskan acara itu yang berlangsung di Kompleks Sukan Pandamaran, semalam.“Kita tidak memohon permit kerana dalam jawatankuasa penganjuran Fiesta Gegar Klang ini, pihak polis terlibat sekali, sepatutnya perkara seperti ini (soal permit) perlu dimaklumkan awal oleh pihak mereka.“Sepatutnya pihak polis memaklumkan lebih awal (berhubung permohonan permit).” katanya dalam kenyataan kepada media.
